resources.string: Android application for tracking the COVID-19 outbreak around the world. This application is open source at [https://github.com/itsamirrezah/COVID-19](https://github.com/itsamirrezah/COVID-19)

* [Android Maps Utils](https://github.com/googlemaps/android-maps-utils) Maps SDK for android utility library
 * [MPAndroidChart](https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart) Powerful android chart view library
 * [RxJava2](https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxJava) and [RxAndroid](https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxAndroid) library for composing event-based programs
 * [Retrofit2](https://github.com/square/retrofit) Type-safe HTTP client for android
 * [MaterialDrawer](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer) The flexbile drawer library for android
 * [ThreeTenABP](https://github.com/JakeWharton/ThreeTenABP) An adaptation of the JSR-310 backport for Android
